price:
42. Wax kama tegin ay ku timid inay ka
dhigtay maahee digada oo kale.
arabic: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَيۡءٍ أَتَتۡ عَلَيۡهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتۡهُ كَٱلرَّمِيمِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: mā tadharu min shayin atat ʿalayhi illā jaʿalathu kal-ramīmi
